content: this mosaic crochet square pattern uses simple stitches to create an eye-catching wreath design that features adorable hearts make it in holiday colors for christmas or coordinate with other squares this pattern is part of the moogly cal 2024 **the pattern is free with ads on my website ** > but you can also purchase the ad-free > printer-friendly pdf here on ravelry > this pattern can also be found in my > crochet membership which includes over > 400 patterns and 100s of video > tutorials you can join the membership > here 1 1 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/crochet/the-crochet-club/ > please add the pattern to your ravelry favorites
